dct_title_s: Novissima & exactissima totius regni Neapolis tabula
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Lacks the imperial privilege found on a later state of map, dated to 1720. Homann founded his own cartographic and publishing establishment in 1702. He became geographer to the Holy Roman Emperor in 1715. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers. Includes view of Mount Vesuvius.
